text: visvasavantayini! oba, obavada, obage pavule udaviyada, minisunda, galda indana bavata pat kala hæki nira ginnen araksa kara ganu. ehi dædi hækiyavangen piri saktisampannayan vana malayikavarunva pat karanu læba ætteya. allah ovunta niyoga kara æti dæyen (podiyak ho) venasak nokaranu labannaha. ovunta (danduvam karana men) tamanta denu læbu niyogayanma itu karamin sitinnaha
